fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Consumers, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
Areas of interests are for example: energy, environment, VAT, rules relating to State aid and competition, economic services of general interest, public procurement, construction, building regulations, accessibility to buildings, economic governance (European Semester), refugee reception. 
At the moment we particular follow the review of EED and EPBD, development of environmental indicators, waste directiv review, Construction 2020, VAT review.
organisation_name: the Swedish Association of Public Housing Companies (SABO)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Housing Europe (European Commission's register of interest representatives n°0124622797-55): http://www.housingeurope.eu/section-37/about-us 
 
NBO, Housing Nordic: http://www.nbo.nu/in-english.html
relevant_communication: We regulary produce puplications, position papers, articles etc and carry out hearing, seminars etc. Mostly in Swedish forums, but somethimes in European ones as well.
goals__remit:
SABO - the Swedish Association of Public Housing Companies - is the organisation of the municipality owned public housing companies in Sweden. Our 308 member companies manage some 807 000 dwellings all together.  
SABO is an industry and interest organisation for public housing companies in Sweden. SABO offers support and service to its members through information, competence and the exchange of experience. We also work to provide good operational conditions for its member companies and the positive development of rental property.  
The public housing sector represents almost 20 percent of the total housing stock in Sweden and half of the rental sector. Every 7th Swede lives in public housing.
